name: Connect Master:Match Puzzle
description:
Hello ~ welcome to our Conenct Master!
Connect Master is a classic tile pair-match puzzle game ,which is fun, casual and challenging!

How to Play ?
Pairs Match: You need to match 2 blocks of the same element, and you will pass the level until all tiles are matched.

Quick Match: More faster you match, more stars you get.

Utilize Tools: If you encounter difficulties, properties can help you!

Avoid Failure: You need to match tiles within three straight lines.

Finish the Map: You pass a level, you will get a piece of the puzzle. After passing the whole stage, the map will be complete, then you can proceed to the next stage.

Game Features
Fun and relaxing : Simple operations can eliminate all squares and release your pressure.

Challenging: Connect Master has 1000+ levels for you to challenge, try your best to get more stars !

Various tiles : Connect Master provides you various funny tiles ,such as: clothes,vehicles,cakes,animals and so on.

Slide tiles: Tiles maybe change positions, you have better pay attention to this situation~

More about us
Connect Master : Pair- Match Puzzle Game consists a large number of levels that get progressively more difficult. You need good logic and strategy to get the challenging levels and unlock different maps and skins. It will not only give you a sense of accomplishment, but also help you train your brain and give you a comfortable experience.
